charges.charge_description: FALSELY AND WILLFULLY REPRESENTED HIMSELF TO BE A CITIZEN OF THE UNITED STATES, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:911; KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY MADE A MATERIALLY FALSE, FICTITIOUS, OR FRAUDULENT STATEMENT OR REPRESENTATION; AND MADE OR USED ANY FALSE WRITING OR DOCUMENT KNOWING THE SAME TO CONTAIN ANY MATERIALLY FALSE, FICTITIOUS, OR FRAUDULENT STATEMENT OR ENTRY, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:1001(a)(2) AND (3); AND KNOWINGLY MAKE A FALSE STATEMENT OR CLAIM THAT HE WAS, OR AT ANY TIME HAD BEEN, A CITIZEN OR NATIONAL OF THE UNITED STATES, WITH THE INTENT TO OBTAIN ON BEHALF OF HIMSELF, ANY FEDERAL OR STATE BENEFIT OR SERVICE, OR TO ENGAGE UNLAWFULLY IN EMPLOYMENT IN THE UNITED STATES, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:1015(e)
